FuncDef: The pki delete-crl command deletes a CRL from the memory. The pki delete-crl command deletes a CRL from the memory.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the PKI realm that the certificate belongs to.
The value must be an existing PKI realm name.

Specifies the name of a CRL file.
The value must be an existing CRL file name.

ExtraInfo: When a CRL expires, run this command to delete a CRL file from the memory. This command will not delete the CRL files in storage card.
